trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Springdale
There were no other sightings in Springdale on or around July 14th 2008
Summary: A large star-like object in the se arkansas skies appeared around 9pm. Was first in two pieces then moved to one.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhen I first saw the objects, they were in two pieces. They appeared as two really large stars, then kind of melded together and I called my daughter and her boyfriend outside. They watched it and at first thought it was just a really large star, but then it appeared to have some kind of tail like a comet. There was a kind of tail of fire behind it. It remained in the same place the entire time I was outside (until approx 11 pm) and never changed location. It just rotates and kind of changes shape.
